00022 #include "mt/proto/smpp/pdu/query_sm.hpp"
00023 
00026 Smpp::QuerySm::QuerySm() :
00027     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00028     CommandId(CommandId::QuerySm),
00029     SequenceNumber::Min)
00030 {
00031 }
00032 
00037 Smpp::QuerySm::QuerySm(
00038         const SequenceNumber& sequenceNumber,
00039         const MessageId& messageId,
00040         const SmeAddress& sourceAddr) :
00041     Request(CommandLength(MinLength),
00042              CommandId(CommandId::QuerySm),
00043              sequenceNumber),
00044     message_id_(messageId),
00045     source_addr_(sourceAddr)
00046 {
00047     Header::update_length(message_id_.length() +
00048                            source_addr_.address().length());
00049 }
00050 
00053 Smpp::QuerySm::QuerySm(const Smpp::Uint8* b) :
00054     Request(CommandLength(MinLength), CommandId(CommandId::QuerySm), 1)
00055 {
00056     decode(b);
00057 }
00058 
00059 Smpp::QuerySm::~QuerySm()
00060 {
00061 }
00062 
00066 const Smpp::Uint8*
00067 Smpp::QuerySm::encode()
00068 {
00069     buff_.reset(Header::command_length());
00070 
00071     Request::encode(buff_); // insert the header first
00072     buff_ += message_id_;
00073     buff_ += source_addr_;
00074 
00075     Header::encode_tlvs(buff_);
00076 
00077     return buff_.get();
00078 }
00079 
00083 void
00084 Smpp::QuerySm::decode(const Smpp::Uint8* buff)
00085 {
00086     Request::decode(buff);
00087 
00088     Smpp::Uint32 len = Request::command_length();
00089     Smpp::Uint32 offset = 16;
00090     const char* err = "Bad length in query_sm";
00091     if(len < offset)
00092         throw Error(err);
00093 
00094     const Smpp::Char* sptr = reinterpret_cast<const Smpp::Char*>(buff);
00095 
00096     message_id_ = &sptr[offset];
00097     offset += message_id_.length() + 1;
00098     if(len < offset)
00099         throw Error(err);
00100 
00101     source_addr_.decode(buff+offset, len - offset);
00102     offset += source_addr_.address().length() + 3; // ton + npi + '\0'
00103     if(len < offset)
00104         throw Error(err);
00105 
00106     Header::decode_tlvs(buff + offset, len - offset);
00107 }
